text: (tavada) “apagē samahara devivarun obaṭa hāniyak æti kara dæmuvēya. (emagin oba manasa avul vī giyēya!) yanna misa, (oba gæna) api vena kīmaṭa kisivak næta” (yayida pævasūha). eyaṭa ohu “ættenma mā allāhva sākṣiyaṭa tabannemi. niyata vaśayenma mā (ohu hæra), oba samānayan tabā namadina dæyen ǣt vūvemi. (meyaṭa) obat sākṣi vaśayen siṭinu” yayi pævasuvēya
